text: Georges Brossard (February 11, 1940 â€“ June 26, 2019) was a Canadian entomologist. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. He founded the Montreal Insectarium, a natural history museum featuring insects that first opened on February 7, 1990. He also hosted the Discovery Channel documentary program Insectia. He became a Member of the Order of Canada in 1999, and a Knight of the National Order of Quebec in 2006. Brossard died of lung cancer on June 26, 2019 in Saint-Mathieu-de-Beloeil, Quebec. He was 79. ==References== ==Other websites== *Montreal Insectarium Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian biologists Category:Order of Canada Category:People from Montreal Category:Entomologists
title: Georges Brossard
